definition: to become brutal, insensitive and unfeeling
details:
verb
- to become brutal, insensitive and unfeeling
= example: to become brutal, insensitive and unfeeling
= synonyms: brutalize, brutalise
- to make brutal, unfeeling, or inhuman
= example: to make brutal, unfeeling, or inhuman
= synonyms: brutalize, brutalise
- to represent in the form of an animal
= example: to represent in the form of an animal
